name: microwave
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(also microwave oven) an electric oven that uses waves of energy to cook or heat food quickly: Put the fish in the microwave and it'll only take five minutes.
goir/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
a very short electromagnetic wave used for cooking food or for sending information by radio or radar
